Generate html report about possible batch effect for a given RiboClass.

Source: R/report.R
report_qc.Rd

Generate html report about possible batch effect for a given RiboClass.

Usage

report_qc(
  ribo,
  specie = "not specified",
  library_col,
  project_name = "Unnamed project",
  output_dir = getwd(),
  comments = NULL
)

Arguments

ribo

A RiboClass object.

specie

studied specie of the project.

library_col

Library/run column in the metadata.

project_name

Name of the project.

output_dir

Path to output dir. Working directory is selected by default.

comments

Path to a text file containing comments

Value

an html file

Examples

data('ribo_toy')
report_qc(ribo_toy, "human", "run")
#>
